titles.title: Strengthening Rural Health Clinics Act of 2021
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve rural health clinic payments.
Strengthening Rural Health Clinics Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Strengthening Rural Health Clinics Act of 2021
This bill applies certain modified payment limits to rural health clinics that temporarily enrolled in Medicare during the public health emergency relating to COVID-19, that applied to enroll by December 31, 2020, or that had binding written agreements for their establishment as of that date.
